oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A NUMERICAL MODEL FOR SEDIMENT TRANSPORT
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lepetit, J.P.
Hauguel, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: numerical model
sediment transport
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We introduce here a numerical two dimensional model for sediment transport which permits to compute the impact of a coastal structure on the bottom evolution. The introduction of current disturbance and some assumptions using difference of time scale between current and bottom evolutions permits to obtain a propagation equation driving the bottom evolution. The model has been calibrated in the case of the local scour around a jetty. At last, it has been applied to the bottom evolution in the vicinity of the new port of Dunkerque.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 16 (1978): Proceedings of 16th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Hamburg, Germany, 1978.; 103
